meanings.definition: Make (something) visible, typically by uncovering it.
meanings.sent1: The sun exposes the hidden treasure in the sand.
meanings.sent2: The detective exposes the criminal's hiding place.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick exposes how the rabbit disappears.
meanings.sent4: The storm exposes the vulnerability of the old house.
meanings.sent5: The flashlight exposes the dark corners of the room.

meanings.definition: Reveal the true nature of (someone or something).
meanings.sent1: The documentary exposes the harsh reality of poverty.
meanings.sent2: The investigation exposes the dishonesty of the politician.
meanings.sent3: The comedy show exposes the silliness of everyday life.
meanings.sent4: The mirror exposes the flaws we try to hide.
meanings.sent5: The test exposes the student's true knowledge.

meanings.definition: Subject (someone or something) to an action or influence.
meanings.sent1: The medicine exposes the patient to potential side effects.
meanings.sent2: The experiment exposes the plant to different light conditions.
meanings.sent3: The game exposes players to new challenges.
meanings.sent4: The training exposes employees to innovative techniques.
meanings.sent5: The journey exposes travelers to diverse cultures.
